div.p: Learn about how Hartford Public Schools is reimagining the district in support of excellent Teaching & Learning, Family & Community Partnerships, School Climate & Culture, and Operational Effectiveness.

div.p: Become a member of the Hartford Public Schools community. Find out how to enroll your student for school today! Contact us at 860-695-8876 or visit our Office of Enrollment and School Choice.

span.a: School districts forge ahead with plans for educating, feeding children
Hartford School Surprised by Wagons Full of School Supplies
HPS Superintendent Honored as Woman of “Distinction”

br.a: Courant Op-ed: Our Children Are Watching

div.p: Hartford Public Schools is a school district serving the city of Hartford, Connecticut. We are one of the largest public school districts in Connecticut, serving over 40 magnet and non-magnet schools in the district.
In partnership with our families and community, Hartford Public Schools is inspiring and preparing all students to meet success in and beyond school.
Click here to learn more about our District Model for Excellence, or click here to learn about our student enrollment process.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid main-color-1-bg vc_custom_1537897003688 vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bottom-to-top bottom-to-top vc_custom_1459352377954

div.h1: USE OUR ONLINE SCHOOL DIRECTORY TO FIND THE RIGHT FIT FOR YOUR CHILD

div.p: Parents should note that choosing an out-of-zone school may affect availability of school transportation. This program is administered by Hartford Public Schools.
There are magnet schools in each school zone. While the majority of students are from Hartford, this program is open to students from the Greater Hartford region.
The most important thing to understand about school choice in Hartford is that all the participating schools are tuition free public schools with open enrollment.
